name: Super Gauntlet X
description:
The local Twerps need a good smashing

And you're the only Gauntlet Knight in town!

Take up arms and lay the smackdown across five brutal arenas

CONTROLS
  • WASD - Move
  • Mouse - Aim
  • F - Lock On/Off
  • Left Click - Left Jab
  • Right Click - Right Jab
  • Hold Click - Charge Punch
  • Hold Click Longer - Unleash Uppercut/Dash Smash
  • [While Locked On] Quick Mouse Left/Right - Dodge
GAMEPLAY TIPS ( IMPORTANT! )
  • Breaking Enemy Guard - Charge Punch breaks enemy Guard
  • Dodging - When Locked On, quickly move the Mouse Left/Right to Dodge enemy attacks and trigger slowmo
  • Power Punches - Power up Uppercut and Dash Smash by using Jab and Dodging enemy attacks
  • Hazards - Use Uppercut and Dash Smash to knock enemies into Hazards for extra Points
Super Gauntlet X was created in a week for the 7DFPS Game Jam!
CREDITS
  • Sean Gabriel (@SuisiegDev) - Design / Code
  • James Berkelmans (@JamesBerkelmans) - Design / Code
  • Hugh Trieu (@HYUUTRIEU) - Banner Art
  • Ryan McMahon (@arybyry) - Misc Enemy Art
  • Jack Eagle (https://bit.ly/3PIFIcU) - Music
